sourcesContent: import React, {useState} from "react"; import "./App.css"; function AddLog ({ onLogSubmit, workoutId }) { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ athlete_id: "", rating: "", mileage: "", details: "", comments: "", workout_id: workoutId }) console.log(formData) function handleFormChange(e) { setFormData({...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } function handleFormSubmit(e){ e.preventDefault() onLogSubmit(formData) } return (
